name: pgo
description: PostgreSQL dedicated ORM with automatic schema sync, table inheritance and much more

scripts.all: npm run npmignore && npm run eslint && npm run coverage
scripts.coverage: TZ=UTC nyc -r lcov -r text -r text-summary -r html mocha test/*js
scripts.examples:
for i in `ls examples/*js` ; do echo '
Executing '$i'
'; node $i ; done

author: Daniele Ricci <daniele.icc@gmail.com> (https://github.com/iccicci)
